servinfo.title: DTC P0962 / P0966 / P0970: Pressure Control Solenoid “A” Control Circuit Low / Pressure Control Solenoid “B” Control Circuit Low / Pressure Control Solenoid “C” Control Circuit Low

entry.ptxt: Terminal arrangement of TCM connector (viewed from harness side)

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Pressure control solenoid valve output voltage is too low comparing with TCM command value.

item.ptxt: Pressure control solenoid valve circuit open or shorted to ground.
Malfunction of pressure control solenoid valve.

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch OFF.
Clear DTCs in TCM and ECM memories by using scan tool.
Keep engine running at idle speed for 30 seconds or more.
Check DTC, pending DTC and freeze-frame data.

action.ptxt: Go to A/T System Check:5 A/T .

testgroup.title: Check pressure control solenoid valve circuit for ground short

test1.ptxt: Check for proper connection to TCM at terminals “E92-2” and “E92-4” (for pressure control solenoid valve-A), “E92-9” and “E92-22” (for pressure control solenoid valve-B) or “E92-19” and “E92-21” (for pressure control solenoid valve-C).

If connection is OK, check continuity between terminal “E92-2” (for pressure control solenoid valve-A), “E92-9” (for pressure control solenoid valve-B) or “E92-19” (for pressure control solenoid valve-C) of disconnected harness side TCM connector and ground.

testgroup.question: Is continuity indicated?

paragroup.ptxt: Pressure control solenoid valve-A, -B or -C control or ground circuit is shorted to ground circuit.
If circuit is OK, go to Step 4.

testgroup.title: Check pressure control solenoid valve circuit for open

test1.ptxt: Check resistance between terminals “E92-2” and “E92-4” (for pressure control solenoid valve-A), “E92-9” and “E92-22” (for pressure control solenoid valve-B) or “E92-19” and “E92-21” (for pressure control solenoid valve-C) of disconnected harness side TCM connector.

testgroup.question: Is it infinity?

paragroup.ptxt: Pressure control solenoid valve-A, -B or -C control or ground circuit is open circuit.
If circuit is OK, go to step 4.

test1.ptxt: Check pressure control solenoid valve referring to Solenoid Valves (Shift Solenoid-A, Shift Solenoid-B, Shift Solenoid-E, TCC Pressure Control Solenoid, Pressure Control Solenoid-A, Pressure Control Solenoid-B and Pressure Control Solenoid-C) Inspection:5 A/T

paragroup.ptxt: Intermittent trouble or faulty TCM. Check for intermittent trouble referring Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection . If OK, substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.

action.ptxt: Replace defective pressure control solenoid valve referring Solenoid Valves (Shift Solenoid-A, Shift Solenoid-B, Shift Solenoid-E, TCC Pressure Control Solenoid, Pressure Control Solenoid-A, Pressure Control Solenoid-B and Pressure Control Solenoid-C) Removal and Installation:5 A/T .
